content: in next 3 st skip next st half_double_crochet blo in next st double_crochet blo in next st** repeat from * to ** 3 times more half_double_crochet blo in next st skip next st single_crochet blo in next 3 st skip next st half_double_crochet blo in next st skip next last st repeat from beginning all around 24 treble_crochet 40 half_double_crochet blo 60 single_crochet blo 16 double_crochet blo 4 chain-2 r17 single_crochet chain-2 single_crochet in corner chain space single_crochet flo in every st to end of side repeat from beginning all around 8 single_crochet 140 single_crochet flo 4 chain-2 7 r18 do not work into any stitches in r17 except at the corners - just work behind them or over them into r16 as indicated 2 double_crochet chain-2 2 double_crochet in corner chain space fptr around first treble_crochet in r16 below skip next 2 st in r17 double_crochet in back loop of st in r16 behind next st fptr around third treble_crochet in r16 below skip next st double_crochet in back loop of sts in r16 behind next 5 st *fptr around double_crochet in r16 below skip next st double_crochet in back loop of sts in r16 behind next 5 st** repeat from * to ** 3 times more fptr around first treble_crochet in r16 below skip next st double_crochet in back loop of st in r16 behind next st fptr around third treble_crochet in r16 below skip next 2 st in r17 repeat from beginning all around 16 double_crochet 108 double_crochet blo 32 fptr 4 chain-2 39 st per side excluding corner chain suggested project using ideas from this free pattern 8 single colour version 5 5 approx in dk with 4 5 mm hook starting chain are counted as the stitch they are replacing and joining slip stitches are not added to the stitch count r1 into magic_ring chain-3 + 15 double_crochet counts as 16 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch into space between chain-3 and next double_crochet 16 double_crochet r2 twisting slightly backwards fpdc around chain-3 which counts as first double_crochet in r1 single_crochet in next 3 st the first st is slightly hidden *fpdc around next st single_crochet in next 3 st ** repeat from * to** to end of round slip_stitch in top of first fpdc 12 single_crochet 4 fpdc r3 chain-3 fpdc around fpdc below double_crochet into top of same st behind fpdc just worked double_crochet in next st double_crochet chain-1 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st *double_crochet in next st the fpdc fpdc around same st double_crochet in top of same st this will be slightly hidden double_crochet in next st double_crochet chain-1 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st ** repeat from * to** to end of round skip slip_stitch at base of chain-3 slip_stitch in space between chain-3 and next st 24 double_crochet 4 fpdc 4 chain-1 9 r4 2 fpdc around next st the fpdc bpsc around next 3 st single_crochet in next chain space bpsc around next 3
